mapper.insert: insert into company_info (user_id, company_name, company_id, city, district, phone, company_character, company_industry, company_business, linksman, linaddress, post_num, fax_num, email) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{company_name}, #{company_id}, #{city}, #{district}, #{phone}, #{company_character}, #{company_industry}, #{company_business}, #{linksman}, #{linaddress}, #{post_num}, #{fax_num}, #{email})
